Nightlight/BlackNightmare/Hydras/Windlord/Rodimus:

Windlord still was aimed to HellPlague's head and readi to take any 
chance to save Organics.

**********

Rodimus opened a com lin to Proto and said "What ever you will do it 
don't have to hurt her" after the com lik was closed he looked at 
HellPlague and tried to find out quickly what to do.

*********
BlackNightmare was pleased with the idea of hostage and said "Then 
we have to give this little gift to Unicron... perhaps he could give 
her a perfect use..."

Nightstrike whispered "Why not take Prime???? it's most wort than 
this one and it seems that he's most than willing to be a voluntary 
hostage..."
**********

Hydras picked up the com link and looking to MAxima said "Come lil 
one... we will have some fun after all"

And leaves the base

**********

Nigthlight/Sedna picked up the com link and send aencoded message to 
Organics "Hold on... I'll be there shortly"

She quickly left Elita in a safe place and left the base, flying 
quickly and covering to Battlefield

--- In nbwrpg@yahoogroups.com, aerosmith4e@c... wrote:
> Proto laughed, "Do not be worrying" He turned into his silver 
form, it shined across the landscape. He liquified and fell into a 
crack in the earth. 
> 
>  Crylatron looked to Rodimus, "Rodimus we can make deals with 
them, they want the bot for a reason."
